## Bio

Kate Gordon studies the epidemiology and biostatistics of aging. Her research focuses on cognitive aging and 
the impact of living alone with, or at high risk of, cognitive impairment. She frequently collaborates with 
researchers who study risk factors for cognitive decline, living well with dementia, and caregiver outcomes.
